Question
========
Provide an estimate for the average daily maximum temperature in July.

Solution
========
Looking at the plot for the first question, the temperature seems between 21 and 22 degree Celsius. We can also extract this information exactly using

```{r, eval=FALSE, echo=TRUE}
GoldCoast %>% 
  group_by(month(Date)) %>% 
  summarise( Mean=mean(MaxTemp, na.rm=TRUE) )
```
